attributes.title: 2019 Hyundai Kona 1.0 TGDI Executive

attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877239377. The new facelifted Honda Amaze. The All New Honda Amaze Comfort model features a new 7''touchscreen infotainment system with Android Auto and Apple CarPlay. For added convenience the new infotainment system incorporates a reverse parking camera on the comfort model, while rear park distance control is now a standard feature. Upgraded new interior to black. A brand new front grille, new 15" diamond-cut alloy wheels and LED Front Fog Lights. Legendary fuel efficiency on the renowned 1.2 liter engine. Come see for yourself the great build quality and reliability.
This vehicle includes a factory warranty of 5 year / 200000km, 2 year /30000km service plan and 3 year roadside assistance. Book your test drive today!

Finance available to all approved buyers, Trade in's Welcome and Delivery Nationwide.

attributes.description:
The light and compact Suzuki Swift with its 1.2l petrol engine offers high output and exceptional fuel consumption at as little as 4.9l / km. Every detail of the third-generation Swift has been cleverly designed to make you feel at one with your new car. 

This fuel efficient vehicle comes with a 5 year / 200000km warranty, 2 year / 30000km service plan and 3 year roadside assistance.

This new spec Suzuki Swift is now packed with ESP(Electronic Stability Program) assisting you in those hectic bends.

Book your test drive today! 

FINANCE AVAILABLE TO ALL APPROVED BUYERS.
TRADE INS WELCOME.
DELIVERY NATIONWIDE.

With VW Polokwane Master Cars we give our customers total peace of mind; every car is checked in our workshop by a qualified VW Technician and undergo a 80 point quality check . Everything that needs to be done is done to the vehicle before you take delivery. 

We are committed to making your purchase experience as easy as possible and are happy to take any trade-in, however old, organise finance for you and any of our other products that will help your ownership experience to be effortless.
